location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 28/5 Royalty Tickets of the Bahrain Petroleum Co. Ltd.'

physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order. There are some notes at the end of the file, (folios 675-677). The file notes are arranged chronologically and refer to documents within the file; they give brief description of the correspondence with a reference number, which refers back to that correspondence in the file.
The foliation sequence starts at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the back cover with 677; numbering is written in pencil, encircled, and may be found in the top right corner of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file mainly contains copies of Royalty Delivery Tickets showing the amount of oil shipped from December 1947 to June 1948, transmitted by Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO) representatives to the Political Agent at Bahrain.
